title: AOMEI Women's Luxury Metallic One Shoulder Sleeveless Elegant Pleated Long Dress
description: The fabric is shiny, super comfortable and very skin-friendly.
Features: Asymmetrical Off Shoulder, High Waist, A-Line Maxi Dress.
This dress has little stretch. If you have a larger waist, it is recommended that you choose a size up.
Our size is difference to standard US size, Please Pick the Size according to Our Size Chart.
Occasion: Prom, Gown, Evening, Party, Club, Cocktail, Going Out, Events.
